# ::file nw_chtb_0294_12.txt
(z0 / and
    :op1 (z1 / and
             :op1 (z2 / explore-01
                      :ARG0 (z3 / country
                                :quant 2)
                      :ARG1 (z4 / condition
                                :ARG1-of (z5 / advantage-01
                                             :ARG2 z3)))
             :op2 (z6 / utilize-01
                      :ARG0 z3
                      :ARG1 z4)
             :ARG1-of (z7 / have-degree-91
                          :ARG2 (z8 / full)
                          :ARG3 (z9 / more)))
    :op2 (z10 / act-02
              :ARG0 z3
              :ARG1-of (z11 / conform-01
                            :ARG2 (z12 / rule
                                       :mod (z13 / economy))))
    :op3 (z14 / guarantee-01
              :ARG0 z3
              :ARG1 (z15 / benefit-01
                         :mod (z16 / bilateral)))
    :op4 (z17 / enrich-01
              :ARG0 z3
              :ARG1 (z18 / shape-01
                         :ARG1 (z19 / cooperate-01))
              :ARG1-of (z20 / continue-01))
    :op5 (z21 / improve-01
              :ARG0 z3
              :ARG1 (z22 / and
                         :op1 (z23 / level
                                   :mod (z24 / trade-01
                                             :ARG0 z3
                                             :ARG2 z20))
                         :op2 (z25 / class
                                   :mod z24)))
    :time (z26 / from
               :op1 (z27 / now)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20081121_1082.19
